# Adding Dns Records To Wix

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/adding-dns-records-to-wix/

## Category
13 Online Booking

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
CAMPAIGNS
USING A CUSTOM EMAIL ADDRESS
Adding DNS Records to Wix

To send emails from a custom email address, you will need to copy your DNS records from Mangomint into your domain provider’s DNS settings.

If Wix is your domain provider, this article covers how to copy your DNS records from Mangomint into Wix.

Link copied
Adding DNS records to Wix

To copy your DNS records from Mangomint into Wix, log in to Wix and go to Settings > Domains.

Select Manage DNS records next to your domain.

In Mangomint, locate the Type for the DNS record and select Add Record in the corresponding section in Wix.

In Mangomint, copy the Host for the DNS record and paste it into the Host name field in Wix.

In Mangomint, copy the Value for the DNS record and paste it into the Value field in Wix. Select Save to add the DNS record to Wix.

Repeat this process to copy your remaining DNS records from Mangomint into Wix.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
